hablar_present_yo.Extra: Present tense, first person singular (I speak)

hablar_present_tu.Extra: Present tense, second person singular (you speak)

comer_preterite_el.Extra: Preterite tense, third person singular (he ate)

vivir_future_nosotros.Sentence: Nosotros _____ en Madrid el próximo año.
vivir_future_nosotros.Extra: Future tense, first person plural (we will live)

ser_imperfect_ella.Sentence: Ella _____ muy inteligente cuando era niña.
ser_imperfect_ella.Extra: Imperfect tense, third person singular (she was)

metadata.description: Spanish verb conjugation practice cards following Fluent Forever methodology
